categories.name: Cybersafety
categories.description: Practices that keep you safe online

questions.text: Do you use different, strong passwords for your accounts?

low.title: Use Stronger Passwords
low.description: Create unique, complex passwords for each account using a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols. Consider using a password manager.

strength.title: Strong Password Management
strength.description: You're using unique, strong passwords for your online accounts, significantly reducing your risk of unauthorized access.

questions.text: Do you change your passwords regularly?

low.title: Change Passwords Regularly
low.description: Update your passwords every 3-6 months, especially for sensitive accounts like banking, email, and social media.

strength.title: Regular Password Updates
strength.description: By regularly changing your passwords, you minimize the risk of compromised accounts, even if a data breach occurs.

questions.text: Do you think before posting content online?

low.title: Consider Impact Before Posting
low.description: Always pause and consider how your post might be interpreted and who might see it before sharing content online.

strength.title: Thoughtful Online Sharing
strength.description: You think carefully before posting content online, which helps protect your digital reputation and privacy.

questions.text: Do you exercise critical thinking when consuming online content?

low.title: Verify Information Sources
low.description: Check multiple reliable sources before believing or sharing information, and question content that seems misleading or too good to be true.

strength.title: Critical Digital Literacy
strength.description: You apply critical thinking when consuming online content, making you less susceptible to misinformation and manipulation.

questions.text: Are you skeptical of strangers who contact you online?

low.title: Maintain Healthy Skepticism
low.description: Always verify the identity of people you meet online before sharing personal information or developing relationships with them.

strength.title: Stranger Awareness
strength.description: You maintain a healthy skepticism toward online strangers, protecting yourself from potential scams or harmful relationships.

questions.text: Do you avoid clicking on suspicious links?

low.title: Avoid Suspicious Links
low.description: Never click on links from unknown sources. Hover over links to verify their destination before clicking.

strength.title: Link Safety Vigilance
strength.description: You carefully evaluate links before clicking, protecting your devices from malware and your accounts from phishing attempts.

questions.text: Do you avoid sharing your passwords with others?

low.title: Keep Passwords Private
low.description: Never share your passwords with anyone, including friends and family. Each person should have their own login credentials.

strength.title: Password Privacy
strength.description: By keeping your passwords private, you maintain full control over your accounts and prevent unauthorized access.

high.message: You have strong cybersafety practices in place. Keep it up!

medium.message: Your cybersafety practices are adequate but could be improved.

low.message: Your cybersafety practices need significant improvement.

categories.name: Cyberbullying
categories.description: How to handle online harassment and bullying

questions.text: Do you ignore provocation, and ask yourself if responding is really necessary?

low.title: Practice Restraint Online
low.description: When faced with provocative content, pause and consider whether responding will help or escalate the situation.

strength.title: De-escalation Skills
strength.description: You avoid engaging with provocations online, which helps prevent cyberbullying situations from escalating.

questions.text: Do you collect evidence of harmful behavior when it occurs?

low.title: Document Harmful Behavior
low.description: Take screenshots of cyberbullying incidents before blocking or reporting, including timestamps and context.

strength.title: Evidence Collection
strength.description: You document harmful online behavior, ensuring you have proof if you need to report incidents to platforms or authorities.

questions.text: Do you utilize block features and reporting tools on platforms?

low.title: Use Blocking and Reporting Tools
low.description: Familiarize yourself with each platform's reporting mechanisms and use them when encountering harmful behavior.

strength.title: Effective Use of Platform Safety Tools
strength.description: You make good use of blocking and reporting features, helping to create safer online spaces for yourself and others.

questions.text: Do you have a trusted adult you can report abuses to?

low.title: Identify a Trusted Support Person
low.description: Establish a relationship with someone you can turn to when facing online harassment or abuse.

strength.title: Support Network
strength.description: Having a trusted person to turn to ensures you never have to face online harassment alone and can get help when needed.

questions.text: Do you use critical thinking and exercise good judgment online?

low.title: Develop Better Digital Judgment
low.description: Consider potential consequences before posting or responding to content, especially in emotional situations.

strength.title: Sound Digital Judgment
strength.description: Your thoughtful approach to online interactions helps you avoid potential conflicts and maintain positive digital relationships.

high.message: You're well-equipped to handle cyberbullying situations.

medium.message: You have some strategies for cyberbullying, but could benefit from more.

low.message: You should develop better strategies for handling cyberbullying.

questions.text: Are you cautious with online strangers?

low.title: Increase Caution with Strangers
low.description: Never assume people online are who they claim to be. Maintain healthy skepticism, especially when someone shows unusual interest in you.

strength.title: Stranger Awareness
strength.description: You maintain a healthy skepticism toward online strangers, which is a key defense against grooming attempts.

questions.text: Are you careful about what personal information you share online?

low.title: Limit Personal Information Sharing
low.description: Never share your address, school/work location, financial information, or detailed personal schedules online.

strength.title: Information Privacy
strength.description: You carefully control what personal information you share online, making it harder for potential groomers to target you.

questions.text: Do you keep communications with strangers public rather than private?

low.title: Keep Communications Public
low.description: Avoid moving conversations with online strangers to private channels like direct messages or private chat apps.

strength.title: Public Communication Habits
strength.description: By keeping conversations in public spaces, you reduce the risk of manipulation in private channels.

questions.text: Do you know how to recognize red flags in online interactions?

low.title: Learn to Recognize Warning Signs
low.description: Be alert to excessive compliments, requests for personal information, attempts to isolate you, and inappropriate questions.

strength.title: Red Flag Recognition
strength.description: Your ability to identify warning signs in online interactions helps you avoid potentially dangerous situations.

high.message: You're vigilant about grooming risks online. Excellent!

medium.message: You have some awareness of grooming risks, but could be more cautious.

low.message: You need to be much more cautious about grooming risks online.

high.message: Excellent! You demonstrate strong online safety practices. Keep maintaining these good habits to stay secure in the digital world.

medium.message: You have a good foundation in online safety, but there's room for improvement. Focus on the recommended actions to enhance your digital security.

low.message: Your online safety practices need attention. Following the recommended improvements will help you better protect yourself in the digital world.
